Spread across several themed zones, the park offers a mix of family-friendly challenges and easygoing games, giving guests plenty of ways to stay active or just have some fun between rounds. To make planning even easier, Gator Mike’s features three package options combining mini golf, go-karts, bumper boats, and arcade . Each bundle is designed for solo visits, pairs, or full family groups, offering flexible ways to spend a day at the park without overthinking the details. Cape Coral's Frightmare on 78 canceled, Gator Mike's owner says News Cape Coral Sports Opinion Restaurants Advertise Obituaries eNewspaper Legals LOCAL No Frightmare on 78 in Cape Coral this year, Gator Mike's owner confirms Charles Runnells Fort Myers News-Press A popular Halloween tradition won't be happening this year in Cape Coral. The annual Frightmare on 78 has been canceled at Gator Mike's Family Fun Park, owner Chris Scuderi said Monday. Frightmare on 78 — formerly known as the Haunted Hike — has taken place at the Pine Island Road fun park for more than three decades. But information about the 2024 event has been missing from the park's website or Facebook page . Scuderi confirmed Monday that there won't be a 2024 Frightmare this year, but he declined to say anything else, including why the event was canceled or whether this is a permanent change. "I won’t be discussing it," he wrote via text. As the Haunted Hike, the annual event took place for 28 years at the former Greenwell’s Family Fun Park on Pine Island Road. It attracted about 10,000 to 12,000 every year and as many as 1,000 to 1,500 people every night during its month-long run, Scuderi said in 2019. Cape Coral's Haunted Hike becomes Frightmare on 78 After Scuderi bought the property in 2019 and changed its name to Gator Mike's, he brought back Haunted Hike as Frightmare on 78. Scuderi said he couldn't legally use the previous name. “We’re gonna spend a lot of time scaring the living daylights out of people,” he told The News-Press in 2019 . “It’s gonna be really cool!” The annual event featured aliens, killer clowns, chainsaw maniacs and more arranged in a maze of walls, fog machines, strobe lights and scary scenes. Last year, the event returned to the woods for the first time since changing its name. Gator Mike's inherited a lot of the old Haunted Hike props and costumes. Most of the same planners and performers were involved, too, at least in the beginning. Many Haunted Hike fans were worried the event was gone for good when Gator Mike's started advertising Frightmare on 78, Scuderi said in 2019. But he didn’t want the Halloween tradition to disappear just because the place had a new owner. “It’s been going for 28 years,” he said. “I didn’t want to let the community down. It’s something that’s been going on for so long.” — Charles Runnells is an arts and entertainment reporter for The News-Press and the Naples Daily News. To reach him, call 239-335-0368 (for tickets to shows, call the venue) or email him at crunnells@gannett.com . Follow or message him on social media: Facebook ( facebook.com/charles.runnells.7 ), X (formerly Twitter) ( @charlesrunnells ), Threads (@crunnells1) and Instagram ( @crunnells1 ). Discover New Skills and Thrills at Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park! - Gator Mike's Family Fun Park Skip to content CALL US DIRECTIONS CALL US DIRECTIONS BOOK ONLINE BUY ONLINE Home Attractions Aerial Ropes / Ziplines / Climb Walls Go-Karts Bones & Bales Fall Festival Bumper Boats Mini Golf Arcade Paintball Spinzone Bumper Cars Plan Your Visit Prices & Specials Hours Location Park Rules Waiver of Claims Food & Drinks Snack Bar Parties & Events Birthday Parties Group Outings Special Events Community Contact Us Fun Park Blog Donation Request Employment Policies Discover New Skills and Thrills at Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park! Hey Southwest Florida teachers and parents, are you looking to end the school year with a bang? Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park is the premier destination in Cape Coral! From heart-pounding adventures to educational mini-golf, we’ve got something for everyone. Read on to learn more about two of our most popular attractions. Test Your Limits With Aerial Adventures! Ready to challenge yourself? At Gator Mike’s, you can choose from two exhilarating ropes courses . The upper-level 14-element course is perfect for thrill-seekers, while the lower-level course offers a fun challenge for kids aged 5-11, parents, and those seeking a less intense adventure. Build confidence, explore your courage, and strengthen bonds as you navigate these exciting courses. Don’t forget to try our 36-foot climbing wall and 600-foot zip line for even more adrenaline-packed fun! Putt and Learn at Dinosaur Falls Mini Golf! Looking for a blend of fun and learning? Our Harris-designed Dinosaur Falls Mini Golf course is a putt-putt paradise that’s both engaging and educational. Since it boasts an ADA-compliant design, it’s open to everyone and offers a variety of obstacles and challenges to keep players of all ages entertained. As kids putt their way through, they’ll learn about sportsmanship, practice their math skills, improve hand-eye coordination, and sharpen problem-solving abilities. It’s mini golf with a dash of S.T.E.M. learning – but don’t tell them and spoil their fun! Why Choose Gator Mike’s for Your Field Trip? Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park is Southwest Florida’s premier destination for family fun and educational experiences. Our friendly staff ensures a safe and enjoyable visit for all, making us the perfect choice for your end-of-year school field trip. With a mix of thrilling adventures and educational activities, we guarantee a day filled with laughter, learning, and lasting memories. So, gather your students, pack your enthusiasm, and book your field trip at Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park today! It’s the perfect way to celebrate the end of the school year and create memories that will last a lifetime. We have education packages designed to meet any budget, so contact us at groupsales@gatormikes.com or call (239) 574-4386, option 1, to discuss your many options! See you soon at Gator Mike’s – where every day is an adventure! Gator Mike's Paintball Arena: Where the Fun Never Stops! - Gator Mike's Family Fun Park Skip to content CALL US DIRECTIONS CALL US DIRECTIONS BOOK ONLINE BUY ONLINE Home Attractions Aerial Ropes / Ziplines / Climb Walls Go-Karts Bones & Bales Fall Festival Bumper Boats Mini Golf Arcade Paintball Spinzone Bumper Cars Plan Your Visit Prices & Specials Hours Location Park Rules Waiver of Claims Food & Drinks Snack Bar Parties & Events Birthday Parties Group Outings Special Events Community Contact Us Fun Park Blog Donation Request Employment Policies Gator Mike’s Paintball Arena: Where the Fun Never Stops! Hey there, thrill-seekers! Ready to unleash your inner warrior and have a blast under the sun? Well, gear up because Gator Mike’s has the best paintball arena in Cape Coral, and it’s time for you to choose your adventure! Adventure Awaits: Traditional vs. Low Impact Paintball! Get ready for a paint-splattering showdown with our two action-packed options. In one corner, we’ve got the Traditional Paintball – 68 caliber paintballs for those who like the original action most. And in the other corner, we present the Low Impact paintball – 50 caliber paintballs that pack a punch without the sting. It’s the ultimate showdown of size versus speed! Bring your squad, your family, or even that one friend who thinks they’re a paintball pro. It’s time to strategize, plan your attack, and show off those paintball skills. And guess what? No need to drag your gear along; we’ve got everything covered – from guns to ammo and, of course, safety gear to keep the good times rolling. Play Until You Drop – Or Run Out of Ammo! The fun never stops at Gator Mike’s. Whether you’re a tactical genius or a paintball gunslinger, our Cape Coral paintball arena is the place to be. Play until you run out of ammo, but hey, if you’re not ready for the party to end, grab some more ammo and keep the paintball extravaganza alive! Target Practice and Tactical Mayhem! Feel like honing those sharpshooting skills? Head over to our target practice area and let loose. Or if you’re more of a team player, gather your friends and dive into some epic paintball battles. It’s all about making those unforgettable memories with your crew. Paintball for All Ages – And Safety First! Kids, teens, adults – everyone is invited! We recommend Low Impact (50 Caliber) for the younger bunch (5-13) and those who want the paintball experience with a little less “oomph.” Traditional (68 Caliber) is perfect for the older bunch (ages 14 and up) who are ready to dive into the full-throttle action. And remember, comfy clothes and closed-toe shoes are your paintball fashion must-haves! Safety is our priority, folks! Waivers are a must for everyone. Gator Mike’s is all about playing safe – we follow industry-standard safety guidelines to ensure you have the time of your life without any unexpected paintball tattoos. Thorough Safety Orientation – Because Safety Rocks! Before you embark on your paintball adventure, we’ve got a “Thorough Safety Orientation” waiting for you. Our paintball referee will cover all the do’s and don’ts, walk you through the safety features of the equipment, and make sure you’re prepped for a safe and enjoyable paintball experience. After all, a safe game is a fun game! Get in Touch – Let the Paintball Madness Begin! So, what are you waiting for? Call us at (239) 574-4386 (Option 1) or shoot us an email at groupsales@gatormikes.com to get all the deets. And hey, be sure to ask about our amazing discount offers – because who doesn’t love a good deal? Gather your crew, put on your game face, and let the paint-splattering madness begin at Gator Mike’s. It’s not just a game; it’s an adventure you’ll be talking about for ages! We offer endless avenues for events that improve the morale and build bonds – just what you need to create successful teams around your purpose. BOOK NOW You can also select one of our Group Outing packages and book online: Silver (from $286.00) Gold (from $396.00) Platinum (from $495.00) Here are some of the events we can host for you Team Building Count on us to come up with team building events in Cape Coral. We can build a fruitful program that lasts anywhere from an hour and a half to an entire day. Client Appreciation Show a client your appreciation in the most enjoyable way! Your fun-loving clients will love our 19-hole ADA compliant mini golf course and our other amazing activities. Corporate Outing Who will emerge as a potential leader? Who is quite the daredevil? We’ll build for you a tailored program that will let you discover your team members’ unique personalities. Church Outing Gator Mike’s Family Fun Park in Cape Coral is great for church outings and is all about creating fun, wholesome experiences for all of our visitors! We offer games, rides, and food to liven up your church outing. Youth Group Activities Mix ministry with fun! Bring your youth group members to our park for a memorable youth group get-together. Come enjoy fun group activities in Cape Coral with your youth group today at Gator Mike’s! Community Church Fundraiser If you’re looking for new ways to raise funds for your community church, let us create a tailored fundraising event for your congregation! Spirit Days/Nights Bring your people to our park for your school’s or organization’s fundraiser and we will contribute a percentage of what you collect for your cause. Not only will you get to enjoy team bonding and group activities in Cape Coral at Gator Mike’s, but you can make a difference too!
